snippet: Turkish officials said a passenger claiming a bomb was aboard wanted the aircraft diverted to Sochi, but it landed in Istanbul and he was arrested.
abstract: Turkish officials say a passenger aboard a commercial airline flight from Ukraine to Turkey tried to hijack it to Sochi, Russia, after the Winter Olympics started; crew fooled the man and other passengers into thinking the plane had landed in Sochi when it was actually in Istanbul.

byline.contributor: Tim Arango contributed reporting from Istanbul, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: Turkish officials said a passenger claiming a bomb was aboard wanted the aircraft diverted to Sochi, but it landed in Istanbul and he was arrested.

headline.main: Deception Foils Attempt to Hijack Turkish Jet to Sochi
headline.print_headline: Deception Foils Attempt to Hijack Turkish Jet to Sochi
